name: Dwarf_Fortress_Defense
description:
There are only 7 waves for now!

Dwarf Fortress Defense is a tower defense game where players protect a dwarven stronghold from goblin and orc raids. With a variety of tower and soldier types to choose from, players must strategically place and upgrade their defenses while managing limited resources to fend off waves of enemies. Featuring a stylized fantasy art style and a variety of game modes, Dwarf Fortress Defense offers fun and challenging gameplay for players of all skill levels.
